objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='backgroundGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A1A2E'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#121212'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#4ECDC4'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#1A535C'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#backgroundGradient)'/><g opacity='0.8'><rect x='-100' y='50' width='680' height='1000' rx='20' ry='20' fill='#0F0F1A'/></g><g><rect x='40' y='800' width='120' height='5' rx='2' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.8'/><rect x='180' y='800' width='60' height='5' rx='2' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='260' y='800' width='40' height='5' rx='2' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.3'/></g><g transform='translate(50,50) rotate(45)'><rect x='0' y='0' width='100' height='6' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='30' y='20' width='80' height='6' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='60' y='40' width='60' height='6' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.2'/></g><g transform='translate(500,80) rotate(45)'><rect x='0' y='0' width='150' height='8' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.15'/><rect x='40' y='30' width='120' height='8' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.15'/><rect x='80' y='60' width='90' height='8' fill='#4ECDC4' opacity='0.15'/></g><path d='M0,300 C100,280 200,320 300,300 S450,280 540,300' stroke='#4ECDC4' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0,320 C150,300 250,340 350,320 S500,300 540,320' stroke='#4ECDC4' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='650' cy='180' r='120' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='920' cy='800' r='80' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
• 40+ Hour Battery Life
• 2.4GHz Low Latency Connection
• Noise-Canceling Microphone

product_details.description: Stable Connection & Stereo Sound: Gtheos Captain 300 wireless gaming headset combines high performance 2.4GHz lossless wireless technology for the accessible connection up to 49 feet in an unobstructed space. Lower latency (≤20ms) and featuring 50mm driver with 30% extra sound effect ensure that the wireless gaming headphones provide higher quality stereo sound, which makes you sense voice of directions, footsteps and every details clearly in games for a better immersive gaming experience. This ps5 headset is very suitable for Fortnite/starfield/Call of Duty/PUBG Detachable Omni-directional Noise-reduction Microphone: Captain 300 wireless ps5 headset combines detachable, flexible, sensible and omni-directional microphone, providing high-end noise cancellation, which not only can be adjusted to the angles you want, also enables you to chat with your teammates with crystal clarity dialogue by this bluetooth gaming headset to coordinate with every scene of your game. Enhancing your ability to triumph in battles by this PS5 gaming headset. 3-in-1 Connection Ways & Multi-platform Compatibility: Captain 300 wireless pc headset supports low latency, lossless 2.4GHz USB dongle and the latest Bluetooth 5.2 stable connection, while supporting 3.5mm wired connection mode. Unique 3 in 1 connection design (equipped with both USB dongle and 3.5mm jack cable) make this wireless headset widely compatible with PS5, PS4, PC, Mac, phone, pad, switch(Invalid Microphone); Xbox series ONLY compatible with 3.5mm wired mode. Ergonomic Design & Long-lasting Battery Life: Gtheos wireless headset for switch design padded adjustable headbands not only good for reducing head pressure but also suitable for various head shapes. Ears are completely covered by soft and breathable memory-protein earmuffs that isolate noises effectively and allow for long gaming sessions without fatigue. This ps5 headset has a sustainable game time of 35-40Hrs. With cool RGB lighting effect turned on(15-20Hrs). Full-recharge in just 3Hrs. Fashion Mirror Surface Design & Professional Services: Gtheos gaming headset wireless is made of high-quality and durable materials. With stylish mirror surface design of the ps5 headset base color, after detaching the microphone, it is not only a wireless gaming headset for pc, but also a suitable multi-scene (subway, home, going out) bluetooth gaming headphones. Meantime, we have experienced engineers and professional support team to provide comprehensive help for each customer. Brand - Gtheos ** Color - White ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 32 Ohm **

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek, tech-inspired design promoting a wireless gaming headset. The composition is visually split, with the left side hosting vibrant text elements, and the right side showcasing a high-resolution product image. The background consists of a dark gradient with abstract graphic accents that subtly draw attention without distraction. A bold heading ("heading") introduces the product, followed by a colored subheading ("tagline"). Key features are presented in a bullet list format ("description"). The price ("price") is prominently highlighted in a large, eye-catching font. A brightly colored call-to-action button ("cta_button", "cta") encourages immediate interaction. The design is modern and clear.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black (#121212)
- Dark Space Blue (#1A1A2E)
- Accent Teal (#4ECDC4)
- Deep Cyan (#1A535C)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Onyx (#0F0F1A)
product_color: The product image highlights a sleek and modern gaming headset with a minimalist color palette that effectively blends sophistication with high-tech appeal. The dominant color is a glossy white (#FFFFFF), giving it a clean and futuristic look. Matte black (#1A1A1A) is used on the headband interior and ear cushions, providing contrast and texture. A striking cyan-blue accent (#00D9FF) outlines the ear cups and logo, drawing immediate attention and adding vibrance. The colors are used harmoniously—the black grounds the visual weight, the white enhances brightness, and the blue makes it pop. This palette is ideal for advertisements focused on innovation and clarity.
